<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\file Convenience wrappers for the LLVM bitcode format and bitstream APIs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This allows you to use a sort of DSL to declare and use bitcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="comment">/// abbreviations and records. Example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">///     using Metadata = BCRecordLayout&lt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="comment">///       METADATA&#95;ID,  // ID</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="comment">///       BCFixed&lt;16&gt;,  // Module format major version</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">///       BCFixed&lt;16&gt;,  // Module format minor version</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">///       BCBlob        // misc. version information</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">///     &gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">///     Metadata metadata(Out);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">///     metadata.emit(ScratchRecord, VERSION&#95;MAJOR, VERSION&#95;MINOR, Data);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For details on the bitcode format, see</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">///   http://llvm.org/docs/BitCodeFormat.html</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Represents a literal operand in a bitcode record.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The value of a literal operand is the same for all instances of the record,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that because this uses a compile-time template, you cannot have a</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">/// raw LLVM APIs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Represents a single bitcode record type.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class template is meant to be instantiated and then given a name,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="comment">/// so that from then on that name can be used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bcgenericrecordlayout"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IDField, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">... Fields&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bcgenericrecordlayout/#ac8ea0d34c1e141c2006c2ce26d416821">BCGenericRecordLayout</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter">llvm::BitstreamWriter</a> &amp;Stream;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
